import React, {useEffect, useState} from "react"; import {InfoProps} from "./carNumInput"; type InfoProps = { bpk : string, cName : string, cCell : string, cJumin : string, cMail : string, cPost : string, cAddr1 : string, cAddr2 : string, cJobN : string, cCarCc : string, cUseN : string, cJobLocal : string, cMoney : string, cDrink : string, cWeekD : string, cOneD : string, cSmoke : string, cWeekS : string, cOneS : string, cHeight : string, cWeight : string, cBank : string, cAccount : string, cPayDt : string, } const SelectBpk = (props : {info : InfoProps, setInfo : React.Dispatch>} ) => { const [bpk, setBpk] = useState('') useEffect(() => { props.setInfo((prevState) => { return { ...prevState, bpk: bpk } }); }, [bpk]); return(
업체선택
) } export default SelectBpk;
